title: What's in the New Node.js, and How Do You Install It?
author: Jack Wallen
description: The latest Long Term Support release of Node.js brings updates while maintaining its position as the go-to runtime for enterprise-scale JavaScript applications.
cntitle: 最新 Node.js 有什么，以及如何安装？
cndescription: 最新长期支持版 Node.js 在保持其作为企业级 JavaScript 应用程序首选运行时的同时，带来了更新。
